description: Daria Tomenko decides to expose the mysterious coins to the public, quietly distributing several to trusted community members and advocacy volunteers, bypassing official channels.
A volunteer medic at a community center finds a coin embedded with data fragments of a vanished citizen. Media outlets quickly pick up the story, fueling speculation and grief citywide.

More coins linked to disappeared citizens are discovered in public spaces across Stenograd. Each contains partial personal records, confirming the existence of an 'invisible' population and stoking outrage against the Council.
Families of the vanished organize a mass rally in the city center, demanding public answers and transparency from Council leaders about the BCI's role in disappearances.
Council Innovators conduct a technical analysis of coin data, uncovering deliberate manipulation in BCI archival protocols—implicating system directives issued under Marek Halden's leadership.
